author: pogmoment
content: how was the 32 ETH figure decided on?

author: wemeetagain
content: Is there a list anywhere of eth2 consensus objects that we _know_ won't change from fork to fork? Primitive types (`Slot`, `Gwei`, etc) and things like `Checkpoint`, `Fork` come to mind.

author: wemeetagain
content: We're looking at namespacing our types by fork, (eg: `phase0.BeaconBlock`, `hf1.BeaconBlock`) but for ergonomics, it would be nice to keep common types (that won't change) available without requiring the fork to be known.

author: wemeetagain
content: Here's my attempt at a list https://hackmd.io/4Vy1OrX0QEuIs3lVdf4trw
